events.message: Applicant submitted a personal loan application to cover upcoming medical expenses and has provided initial personal information.
The application was reviewed by the system and categorised under personal loans due to medical expense keywords.
A loan officer specializing in personal loans was assigned to assist the applicant with this medical-related loan request.
Initial review of applicant credit history and submitted details began to evaluate eligibility for the requested personal loan.
Requested supporting documents including medical bills, proof of income, and identification to proceed with loan verification.
Applicant submitted all requested documents on time, including medical invoices and recent pay stubs, aiding swift assessment.
Completed credit check showing applicant has a fair credit score with no recent defaults, providing a positive risk indicator.
Risk assessment concluded with manageable risk factors considering current debt-to-income ratio and medical reasons.
Presented personal loan offer outlining terms, interest rates, and repayment schedule tailored for medical expense coverage.
Applicant acknowledged the loan offer, expressing gratitude for the clear terms and intentions to accept the proposed deal.
Loan application was formally approved after meeting criteria and satisfactory applicant feedback on terms provided.
Funds were successfully disbursed to the applicantâ€™s linked bank account to assist with urgent medical expenses.
Conducted standard follow-up call to ensure applicant received funds and address any further inquiries about loan management.
The loan application case was officially closed following successful funding and post-approval follow-up completion.
